name: Yahoo Mail - Remove Ads Better
description:
- Updated to support New Yahoo! Mail Interface (Oct 2013, March 2014 and June 2014 updates)

Removes all the ads from Yahoo Mail including:
- Right-side banner
- Folder area ad
- Empty folder right side ad
- Send message confirmation ad
- What's New right side ads (2)
